name: Shadows of Rogue: The Sorcerer's Curse
name_original: Shadows of Rogue: The Sorcerer's Curse
description:
In this roguelite game, you'll face increasingly relentless hordes of enemies and formidable bosses, all while discovering an array of valuable items and surprises along the way. Prepare for a casual yet intensely challenging gaming experience, with a wide range of options and battle combinations at your disposal.

PREPARE TO DIE

Right from the start, brace yourself for numerous deaths, as the game will push your limits. However, don't be disheartened, as you can utilize the gold you gather during each run to unlock potent upgrades and weapons that will aid you in progressing further. With hard-hitting bosses, interesting locations, and hidden secrets to uncover, your journey is bound to be a thrilling one.

Key Features:


■ retro graphics and music, inspired by NES games!
■ Some quotes in-game have real voices converted to 8 bit sounds for some characters!
■ An interesting and unique medieval story!
■ Characters that can talk and tell lore stuff!
■ Incredible replay factor. Each run is different in some aspects!
■ Fight against hard oldschool bosses!
■ Choose your preferable class to fight. You can play with classes like the warrior, archer, wizard, and others!
■ Tons of unlockables, including new items, bosses, places, and new classes. Some unlockables require you to buy them with gold, and others require you to do a specific achievement to unlock!
■ Run at 60FPS!


TIPS

■ Every five minutes, a new boss will emerge. Each boss comes with unique abilities and tactics, pushing your strategic thinking and reflexes to the limit.

■ Every 2 minutes, the luck system will check if you are able to find nearby places, like a shop, tavern, where you can spend your obtained coins and get better items.
■ Talk to the shopkeeper, he will say useful things and also interesting happenings on the realm!
■ The player can carry only a specific amount of gold coins, so make sure to buy a coin purse in the shop to carry more!


LOT OF SECRETS TO FIND


■ Secret bosses!
■ New classes to play!
■ A giant boss!
■ A tremendously giant boss which is even bigger!
■ A boss which is a actual giant! A hill giant, in fact!
■ Mysterious places!
